text: The Libertarian Party of Canada is a libertarian political party in Canada. It was started in 1973 by Bruce Evoy, who became the party's first chairman. The current leader of the party is Tim Moen. The party wants to limit the role of the federal government in people's lives. For example, it would reduce or eliminate most personal and coporate taxes. == Other websites == * == References == Category:Political parties based in Ottawa Category:1973 establishments in Canada Category:Libertarian parties
title: Libertarian Party of Canada
